name: Ext_R4B_Dosage_asNeeded
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.Dosage.asNeeded[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Dosage.asNeeded[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Dosage|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Indicates whether the Medication is only taken when needed within a specific dosing schedule (Boolean option), or it indicates the precondition for taking the Medication (CodeableConcept).
element.comment: `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` maps to R5 `Dosage.asNeeded`. To multiple elements in Dosage: (`Dosage.asNeeded`, `Dosage.asNeededFor`). Type `CodeableConcept` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` maps to R5 `Dosage.asNeededFor`. To multiple elements in Dosage: (`Dosage.asNeeded`, `Dosage.asNeededFor`). Type `boolean` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Indicates whether the Medication is only taken when needed within a specific dosing schedule (Boolean option), or it indicates the precondition for taking the Medication (CodeableConcept).
element.comment: `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` maps to R5 `Dosage.asNeeded`. To multiple elements in Dosage: (`Dosage.asNeeded`, `Dosage.asNeededFor`). Type `CodeableConcept` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Dosage.asNeeded[x]` maps to R5 `Dosage.asNeededFor`. To multiple elements in Dosage: (`Dosage.asNeeded`, `Dosage.asNeededFor`). Type `boolean` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
